name: let it snow tree skirt
notes:
***the medium size is available for free on my website. size sm, med, and lg are available in the pdf version here on ravelry.*** 

**materials** 
•	 lion brand wool-ease thick & quick or similar #6 super bulky yarn.

* small: 250 yds
* medium: 620 yds
* large: 856 yds

•	9mm crochet hook 
•	scissors
•	large eye yarn needle to weave in ends.

**gauge and size**

gauge: 6 sts x 3 rows = 3 inches in blo dc

size
•	small: 27-inch diameter
•	medium: 37-inch diameter
•	large: 47-inch diameter
